text.label:
For some special applications (e.g. first training lesson in hang gliding school) the handling of this glider is too responsive.
This dialog enables an adjustment of the handling characteristic to your special needs. For this purpose, factors for some roll and pitch coefficients are introduced. Note that this manipulation makes only sense in the 'normal' flight regime. Stall and spin behavior could be falsified.
In order to conveniently switch between different requirements, three settings are predefined: Rookie, Student and Pilot. The values for 'Rookie' and 'Student' are hard-coded in the file 'Nasal/Handling.nas'. Adapt them to your needs.
This variables are NOT auto-saved. Default is 'Pilot' (the original settings / handling characteristics).
